overview: György Dobrai's movie about the prostitution on the streets. Rákóczi Square is the center of the prostitution in Budapest. Everybody knows this much. But not too many people actually know what really goes on behind the scenes. This documentary attempted to cover these unknown spots of the business.  Nude screens, rude language and the forbidden shadows of the Hungarian Socialism - the movie was banned for years in that time.
title: K1 - A Film About Prostitutes
